mapper.select: SELECT id, question_id, email, contents, reg_date FROM Registrations ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, question_id, email, contents, reg_date FROM Registrations WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Registrations (question_id, email, contents, reg_date) VALUES (#{questionId}, #{email}, #{contents}, curdate())
mapper.select: SELECT rq.category as id, c.name, c.description FROM Categories c RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT r.id, q.category FROM Registrations r INNER JOIN Questions q ON r.question_id = q.id ) rq ON c.id = rq.category WHERE rq.id = #{id}
